Address.label: Address
Address.value: ONE FINANCIAL PLAZA, HARTFORD, Connecticut, 06103, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Virtus Investment Partners Inc provides investment management and related services to individuals and institutions. Its retail products include open-end mutual funds, closed-end funds, exchange-traded funds, and variable insurance funds. Geographically, the activities are carried out through the region of the US and the group generates revenue through investment management fees, distribution and service fees and administration and shareholder service fees.

value.name: Richard William Smirl
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
